Text.Value: See those posts? Run toward them.
Offer him your hand. He can follow your scent to your camp in the wilderness.
Nod to the goalposts - he'll be safe there.
*The cub's feathers ruffle in distrust. With a defiant squawk, he bounds away.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] coaxes [owlbear cub] forward, Owlbear doesnt follow, not trusting the [player]

Text.Value: *The cub breathes in shallow bursts, his chest heaving with the effort.*
The goblins tried to hurt you. Show them what hurt really means.

EditorData.NodeContext: SFX only

Text.Value: Guide his gaze to the goblins - they deserve to die.
*The cub seems anxious to leave, but afraid to defy the goblins. They have to be dealt with, one way or another.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.

Text.Value: *The owlbear coos softly. He doesn't understand - but he trusts you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [ANIMAL] [PLAYER] Rub owl bear and, owl bear getting rubbed [jACK]
EditorData.NodeContext: The player has freed the owlbear. It is tentatively following the player but is prepared to attack should it be provoked.

Text.Value: *The cub looks at you with dulled eyes. He longs for home.*

EditorData.NodeContext: Angry

Text.Value: *... it's furious. Rage blazes within it. Tear. Hunt. Kill.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack
dupe [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack {felix]
EditorData.NodeContext: SFX only - Angry

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] coaxes [owlbear cub] forward, Owlbear doesnt follow, not trusting the [player]
EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "No! They'll hurt me! I have to run!"
As in: "Go away! I'll bite you! I'll really do it!"
SFX only - Exasperated/On-Edge

Text.Value: *The cub's beak snaps in the air, eager to rend, yearning for blood and soft belly-flesh.*

EditorData.NodeContext: The owlbear is furious and about to erupt in a killing spree.

Text.Value: *Talons tensed to strike, beak aching to rend - the cub wants you gone.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack {felix]
EditorData.NodeContext: The cub no longer trusts the player and wants him gone. A threat.

Text.Value: *But his mother is gone - taken. All that's left are these creatures.*

EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "I have to run! They'll get me!"

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.
EditorData.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

Text.Value: They won't hurt you if you run to those posts.
*You notice a shiver run through his feathered coat - fear, a desperate longing for the safety of his nest.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [ANIMAL] [PLAYER] Rub owl bear and, owl bear getting rubbed [jACK]

Text.Value: *He runs away. Only time will tell if he'll reappear.*

EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "Mommy's gone. I'm hungry!"

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cub tilts head, considering player, then backs away and leaves.
EditorData.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record.

Text.Value: Got to get away from here first.

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack {felix]
EditorData.NodeContext: SFX only. Angry.

Text.Value: The goblins are responsible for your pain. Kill them.
*The cub clicks his beak weakly - more scared than afraid. He has no fight left in him.*

EditorData.NodeContext: The owlbear doesn't trust the player and is warding it off.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Owlbear cub] tensens its body and prepares to attack
EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "I'm going to kill them!"

Text.Value: *Its talons bite deep into the earth, every muscle trembling. You realise it isn't afraid...*

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack {felix]

EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "The goblins are going to hurt me. I have to run! Where can I run?!"
As in: "I want to go home to my cave, to my mother."

EditorData.AnimationTags: dupe [Owlbear cub] feeling betrayed and angy is ready to attack {felix]
EditorData.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

Text.Value: I have a camp. You're welcome there.
*The cub tilts his head. He's considering it.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] coaxes [owlbear cub] forward, Owlbear cub follows, trusting the [player]
EditorData.NodeContext: As in: "It'll be safe there? I have to run!"

Synopsis: This owlbear has been captured by the goblins. It is a cub and has been tormented by the goblins. In this dialog the player can reassure it, guide it to safety, or encourage it to attack the goblins. If the player has convinced his captors to release him, they can invite him to their camp. The owlbear refuses - but will show up later on his own.
